title: aylabadia05
author: aylabadia05
content: 1. Be patient, don't panic.2. Buy and hold.The first attitude is very suitable to be applied and very many traders experience tremendous panic when they see the market price drop, especially Bitcoin is now at $18k.It's becoming increasingly apparent that other coins are very influential on Bitcoin. So, the opportunity to buy to increase the volume of Bitcoin can be done again for long-term investments. The current market situation in my opinion is a very tough test to be applied by those who are impatient.Do not panic. Everything will get better.

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: There is no need to keep advising people to hold, i have seen this advice so much in the last weeks since bitcoin started plunging, if they do not believe in bitcoin or that this kind of plunge has happened before and that it will return back up, then let them sell to stronger hands that are ready to buy at all times, and just maybe experience will teach them to research next time.

Weak hands are probably struggling these days fighting their own emotions, not to fall for another trap because of being impatient. Otherwise, everything will fall apart and see them in the losing end. So stay calm and don't panic. What we see now won't take forever, the market dump is only temporary. Instead, this is the perfect moment to buy and hold, as it could bring huge amount of profits when bitcoin skyrocket again and reach another new ATH.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: I've been there before and did really panicked and it's no use. Everyone who's feeling a panic attack should do panic in buying instead of selling and worrying about the market situation.I know that it's hard to accept and deal with it but this is the market. The volatility that we've got is really disappointing probably for the new ones but this is also the reason why bitcoin went high. You only need to be patient and don't sell at losses or if you want to cut losses, I think it's too late so just hold or buy.

comments.author: BITCOIN4X
comments.body: Quote from: aylabadia05 on June 18, 2022, 07:26:19 PM1. Be patient, don't panic.2. Buy and hold.The first attitude is very suitable to be applied and very many traders experience tremendous panic when they see the market price drop, especially Bitcoin is now at $18k.It's becoming increasingly apparent that other coins are very influential on Bitcoin. So, the opportunity to buy to increase the volume of Bitcoin can be done again for long-term investments. The current market situation in my opinion is a very tough test to be applied by those who are impatient.Do not panic. Everything will get better.The biggest threat when the price drops is the loss or diminishing of the estimated value you have for your bitcoins and other Crypto assets. This is a factor that makes traders panic because not all traders and investors will be able to survive without worrying at times like this. Weak hands will sell and secure their capital, strong hands will buy to make a profit in the long term. Situations like this will continue to be repeated because the weak will get weaker and the strong will get stronger. So make a choice in which group we will be at a time like this and of course the finances and the strength of the funds we have will determine everything.

comments.author: Markinzo
comments.body: Worrying about the current market drop doesn't change a thing. This isn't the first time that the market has been this bad and old investors understands what's at stake and what they stand to gain should the market pump at any time. So let the impatient ones go on selling for there will always be buyers ready to buy and hold cause they know what's ahead only just a matter of time.Just recently I have come across a proliferation of advise related threads on the current market  and I wonder why, cause every well calculating investor will know this is the right time to hold patiently "there will surely be light at the end of the tunnel".

comments.author: pixie85
comments.body: I use to say: don't worry about the things you cannot control. Worry about the mistakes you can do and try to prevent them. If you touch a live wire and get electrocuted it's on you. If you walk outside and get hit by a lightning, it's not your fault. Worrying about such things will only make you nervous, fearful, unable to enjoy life.My choice was to buy and hold bitcoin and if there's a nuclear war or a global ban, It's not something any of us can be ready for. I can with all honesty say that I did my best to secure my financial freedom.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: aylabadia05 on June 18, 2022, 07:26:19 PM1. Be patient, don't panic.2. Buy and hold.Being patient with the market can help you decide on when to buy and sell, panicking is really not good at all and this should be practice by everyone especially now that we might see another bottom.Buy and hold good coins not just any shitcoins because they might not be able to survive on this bear market. Buying is not easy, it is still need some analysis so you can be on a good place same thing with holding, it is still good to know when to sell and have a target price for this.

comments.author: countryfree
comments.body: I'm not panicking, actually I'm quite happy a big clean-up is coming.There are more than a thousand altcoins, let's get real 99% are sh*tcoins. Celsius failed because it promised abnormal returns on your investment. Some exchanges allow trading with too much leverage. Some will die, but I'm confident the market will be much healthier when it recovers.

comments.author: cute nmp
comments.body: The market is in a bad condition currently.I will definitely hold onto all my investment for the main time.Selling any altcoins will be a great loss at the moment the best option is to continue holding till we see the cryptocurrency market recovers.Patience is the best thing to exercise at the moment.

comments.author: Desmong
comments.body: I think it's only newbies that will be panic in this kind of market that is falling very fast before your eyes. The current condition of the market will soon fade away and the upward market will take control. The market had been moving in this pattern for long and when it was time for the bull season, everyone was happy. Now that everything is going sour we need to be patient and relax because join comes in the morning.

comments.author: Vaskiy
comments.body: Everyone won't be in such a situation. It is the rule of the market, the patience you have when the market is in decline will profit you in the long term. Here the big holders have the ability whereas the small holders will be in fear as the investment weren't made out of excess money, but it was made from the limiting the life needs. This is why the panic can be seen much among the small holders.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: Yeah it’s pretty crazy seeing $18K when my lowest price was the 200 WMA which was at like $22,222 which was almost $5000 higher than here. And yet we managed to go lower. The low for the day is $17600 or so.I remember when Bitcoin went to $42K and everybody here was like “bought the dip, low in for the year” this was when $69K was the top. And it’s crazy having it go more than half that lower. Right now the way it’s trading, doesn’t look like it will be the low.

comments.body: Nothing increases in value all the time. Of course there will be drop. In times like these, the only thing to do is forget. Forget about your investment and try not to think about it. Buy bitcoin whenever you can. Looking ahead, you will always have made a profit.
